name: Authenticate User
description: Authenticate a user with their username and password.

name: Get User Collection
returns: List of Card objects or error

name: Get User Game History
description: Retrieve the user's game history of explorations and battles.
returns: List of Exploration and Battle objects or error

name: Trade Cards
returns: Updated card collections for both users or error

name: Explore Location
description: Initiate an exploration event with selected cards and location.
returns: Exploration object with event description and loot or error

name: Battle
description: Initiate a battle event with selected cards and location.
returns: Battle object with event description and loot or error

name: Add Card to Collection
description: Add a card to the user's collection.

name: Remove Card from Collection
description: Remove a card from the user's collection.
